name: No Time for Monologues
description:
A 2 player asymmetrical multiplayer platformer in which one player controls a valiant hero tasked with destroying the token evil of a generic fantasy story, while the other plays as a large boss monster who is less than pleased with this aggressive tin can trying to save the world.

  • Asymmetrical gameplay.
  • 2 Unique Boss monsters and lairs.
  • Pixel art! 
  • Fast Gameplay.
  • The means to crush your friends! Because who doesn't love that honestly?

 

Game by Matthew Bland / 3 Way Glass
